WE'RE LOOKING FOR YOU!
Feel like you are up to the challenge. Why not join Team Duty on their campaign to rule the Dutyverse. With the Launch of COD Infinite Warfare, we are striving set up four new teams Two Male & Two Female teams.

Find you feel link you’re up for the challenge, feel free to contact us at trulybadgamer@gmail.com. In the e-mail please send use a link to some recent gameplay from youtube, a screen shot of your stats, and a reason why you want to join Truly Bad Gamer.

If you require any additional information prior to your application. Please do not hesitate to contact us before had.
